title: Prompt Grounding Schema
description: Standard schema for defining prompts for openai and claude

complexity.description: Complexity level of the prompt (low, medium, high).

promptpatterns.description: List of prompt patterns(chain of thoughts, step back,self consistency, reason and act, etc).

type.description: type of LLM capabilities used(summarization, Q&A, Name Entity extraction, correlation, etc).

domain.description: Domain of the prompt(it operations, hr, finance, etc).

role.description: Role of the persona (e.g. HR Manager, IT Admin, etc)

responsibility.description: Responsibility of the persona(e.g. hiring, onboarding, system health monitoring, L1 Suppoort etc)

skills.description: Skills of the persona (e.g. communication, problem solving, technical skills, log analysis etc)

task.description: Task to be performed ( e.g. log analysis, log corelations, data structured query, etc)

task_goal.description: Clear Goal definition of the task(e.g. generate accuarte system health report, identify root cause of issues identfied in the logs, classify user intent of the user request, etc)

task_instrctions.description: Instructions for the task(e.g. steps to analyze the logs, steps to identify the errors and warnings, steps to analyze Sql Query results etc)

relevant_context.description: Relevant context for the task(e.g. application logs, infrastrcuture logs, sql query results, user request, etc)

input.description: Input of the example - user's request or query

output.description: desired output or response from agent

type.description: Type of the output format - html, markdown, text, etc
